description: An example resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.

ProfileName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

ProfileVersion.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[0-9a-zA-Z]{10}$  
Update requires: Replacement

Action.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

Principal.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

StatementId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement
